Welcome to The Future was Flash!
In case it isn't obvious, you need Flash Player or Lightspark to play these.

It seems you're using a mobile browser. Keep in mind most mobile bowsers don't support flash and consequently you won't be able to access most of the site. Consider using a desktop computer or Puffin Browser on android instead.


Lengend:
Green = works perfectly
Yellow = works with errors
Red = doesn't work
Gray + Strikethrough = removed because of DMCA notice
